alert.note: Alert for Menifee; Morgan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:33PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Morgan and east central Menifee Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 432 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Denniston, or near Frenchburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Korea and Artville around 440 PM EDT. Ebon, Dan and Big Woods around 445 PM EDT. Kellacey and Omer around 450 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Zag, Twentysix, Paragon, Yocum, Dehart, Blaze, Licking River, Leisure, Wrigley, Pomp, Lick Branch and Blairs Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
